sentences.english: Finance and Administration includes various departments such as …
sentences.chinese: 财务与行政部包括许多不同的部门。

sentences.english: Forensic dean blames administrative front courtyard to ought not to not see object tousle subpoena.
sentences.chinese: 法院院长责备行政庭不该不看对象乱发传票。

sentences.english: According to informed sources, "the Deputy Editor-in-Chief" is an administrative level.
sentences.chinese: 据知情人士说，“副总编辑”是一个行政级别。

sentences.english: On the Nature of Administrative License.
Article 3 The Macao Special Administrative Region shall be vested with independent judicial power, including that of final adjudication.
sentences.chinese: 第三条澳门特别行政区享有独立的司法权和终审权。

sentences.english: Local secondary education is concentrated in the provincial capitals and some district centers.
sentences.chinese: 当地的中级教育主要集中在省会和其它一些行政中心。

sentences.english: I've come to learn that Chinese officials like to make "examples".
sentences.chinese: 我之前就了解到中国的行政官员喜欢树立“典型”。

sentences.english: The Chief Executive may, as he or she deems necessary, invite other persons concerned to sit in on meetings of the Council.
sentences.chinese: 行政长官认为必要时可邀请有关人士列席会议。

sentences.english: The bauhinia flower is the emblem of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region.
sentences.chinese: 我第一次看见紫荆花是在香港特别行政区的区徽上。

sentences.english: The competent authorities shall impose necessary administrative and disciplinary sanctions on those who have violated the aforesaid provisions.
sentences.chinese: 违反者，主管部门应给予必要的行政或纪律处分。

sentences.english: Persons with no competence shall be represented by their legal agents in administrative procedures.
sentences.chinese: 无行为能力人由他的法定代理人代为参与行政程序。

sentences.english: He desired to obtain a position in the Civil Service.
sentences.chinese: 他想望在政府行政机关里谋到一个职位。

sentences.english: Vicky: graduated from the Department of Administration in Chung I Hsing University.
sentences.chinese: 我从中兴大学的行政管理学系毕业。

sentences.english: This separation of powers between the Executive and the Legislature is part of the constitution's checks and balances.
sentences.chinese: 这是行政立法两权分立相互制衡的宪政架构。

sentences.english: The police rank of any traffic policeman who is imposed upon an administrative sanction below removal from post shall be degraded.
sentences.chinese: 受到撤职以下行政处分的交通警察，应当降低警衔。

definition: administrative unit (e.g. province 省[sheng3], prefecture 地區|地区[di4 qu1] or county 縣|县[xian4])
